Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behaviour or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Hoppy House Taproom & Hangout Place Open main menu Events About How It Works Food On Tap Contact You must be 21 to view and use this website. I'm over 21 I'm not over 21 We Love Beer & We Love People Our mission at Hoppy House is to build a true hang out place within our community where people can come together, try different drinks and have relaxing time after a long day at work. What's On Tap Our Menu Your browser does not support the video tag. RTP's first self-pour taproom. Over 50 beers & wines on draught. How it works Step 1 Check In Check in with ID, provide a form of payment, & get a wrist band Step 2 Select Go to beer wall, select a drink, touch wrist band to little bunny to activate tap Step 3 Pour Tilt your glass at 45 degree angle and slowly straighten as it fills up to control froth. Pour as much or as little as you like. You are charged by the ounce. Step 4 Relax Have Fun! Enjoy your time with family and friends or make some new ones. Board Games, Karaoke, Comedy Nights, & Live Music - Relax and Have a Great Time! Hoppy House Taproom & Hangout Place Why Choose Hoppy House Self-Pour With over 50 beers and wines available pour as little or as much as you want, you are charged by the ounce. Wide Variety What makes us unique is our expansive selection of drinks. We have the best local beers, wine, and cocktails available. Great Food Everything about our food is tasty and cooked the way it would be at home. Our menu includes fresh and quality products. Inviting Atmosphere Our friendly customer service and cozy dining area provides the perfect environment for a memorable hangout with your friends. Events Thursday Trivia 7pm Menu Shareables Garlic Bread Sliced italian bread seasoned with garlic and spices, toasted & served with red sause (cheese add-on available) Personal Size $5.99 Shareable Size $10.99 Cheese Curds (v) $7.99 The irresistible aroma of garlic breaded cheese curds show off the flavor and squeaky texture of fresh white cheddaqr cheese with parsley and light breading served with red sause. Chips & Salsa (v) $6.99 Fire roasted taqueria style salsa served with warm tortilla chips Pretzel Bites (v) $7.99 Classic salted served with mustard dipping sauce Mac & Cheese Bites (v) Pepper Jack: Creamy pepper jack cheese coated with crispy garlic batter. Great with wines $8.99 Smoked Gouda: combining al dente pasta with eight delicious cheeses. Great with wines $9.99 Spicy Cauliflower Bites (v) $8.99 Made from premium white florets in a spicy batter & mild Aleppo pepper. Great with all beers & cocktails Tater Tots (v) $5.99 Classic oven backed crispy potato tots served with ranch. Great with IPAs Loaded Nachos (v) Tortilla chips covered in fire roasted taqueria salsa, variety of veg toppings, covered in cheese and drizled with beer cheese, nacho cheese & ranch. Personal Size $9.99 Shareable Size $14.99 Pizza Classic Cheese $7.99 Zesty tomato sauce plus the melding melting flavors of mozzarella, Cheddar, provolone, and Parmesan cheeses. Veggie Lover (v) $8.99 Our classic four cheese pizza with onion, mushrooms, olives, green peppers & JalapeÃ±os Meat Lover $9.99 Our classic four cheese pizza with sausage, beef, bacon & pepperoni Pepperoni $8.99 Our classic four cheese pizza topped with pepperoni slices Hawaiian $8.99 Our classic four cheese pizza topped with ham & pinapple Supreme $9.99 Our classic four cheese pizza sprinkled with all veggie & meat toppin Make Your Own $8.99 Chose any two toppings on our classic four cheese pizza Additional toppings @ $0.99 Wings Bone-In or Boneless Wings Medium roasted wings cooked with neutral roasted flavor tossed in choice of BBQ, Buffalo, Garlic Parmesan, Thai Curry, Mango Habanero or Plain served with ranch Personal Size $9.99 Shareable Size $16.99 Dipping sauces (extra @ $0.99): BBQ, Garlic Parmesan, Buffalo, Thai Curry, Honey Mustard Kitchen Hours Monday to Saturday: 4pm - 9:30pm Sunday: 2pm - 9:00pm For group of 6 or over 18% gratuity applied to all checks (V) - Vegetarian Contact Us Fill out the form or contact us directly using the info below. General Enquiry: (919) 797-0089, info@hoppy-house.com Events Enquiry: (919) 446-5154, events@hoppy-house.com First name Last name Email address Phone number Choose a subject General Enquiry Events Enquiry Subject Message Send Love your experience? We'd be so grateful for your honest review! Peter Hoppy Post – Founder Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Panelized Structures Inc. Safety, Innovation, Experience Home Company About / Leadership / Safety What We Do Roof Structures / Other Services / PEMB / Solar Media Center Blog / Technical Resources Contact Careers / Service Areas Menu Home Company About Leadership Safety What We Do Roof Structures Other Services PEMB Solar Media Center Blog Technical Resources Contact Careers Service areas Peter Hoppy Post – Founder Keith H Coonce – President Shane Carvalho – VP of Operations, Southern NV/AZ Tom Eccles – Regional VP North Tony Galvan – Regional VP South Tim Lessard – VP Sales & Estimating Katy Coonce – VP Finance Mark Schlegelmilch – Executive Staﬀ / CPA Mark A. Dalton – PE/CSHO/CWI Ed Hass – Metal Building Division Manager Tim Pfisterer – Electrical Project Manager Scott Heinsohn – PNW Area Manager Elaine Whitworth  – Detailing Manager Mike Potter –  Southern CA Estimator/ Project Manager Joe Reis – VP Operations Chris Brahler – Northern NV Area Manager Rodney Coons – AZ Estimator / Project Manager Michael Moore – Safety Manager Robert Nelson – Southern NV Area Manager Weston Coonce – Executive VP Jason Buell – Southern CA Area Manager Leadership Our team at Panelized Structures, Inc. is comprised of individuals with extensive industry knowledge, excellent communication skills and professionalism. Meet the people behind the projects: Peter Hoppy Post – Founder Peter Post, known by all in the construction industry as “Hoppy”, started his roof structure construction career as an apprentice carpenter in July of 1963. In the years since, he has worked through his assignments as a craftsman, job site supervisor, estimator and construction manager. He is proud to have been tutored by the founding leaders of the modern-day roof structure industry. In May of 1989, he founded Panelized Structures, Inc. Hoppy was instrumental in developing the current “hybrid” panelized roof system used in the majority of the roof structures in the western United States today. Hoppy is proud to have developed a reward system for his employees that recognizes excellence and demands safe construction methods. Though semi-retired he continues to find ways to motivate his associates to create new and better methods of construction. hoppy@panelized.com Peter Hoppy Post – Founder Keith H Coonce – President Shane Carvalho – VP of Operations, Southern NV/AZ Tom Eccles – Regional VP North Tony Galvan – Regional VP South Tim Lessard – VP Sales & Estimating Katy Coonce – VP Finance Mark Schlegelmilch – Executive Staﬀ / CPA Mark A. In the years since, he has worked through his assignments as a craftsman, job site supervisor, estimator and construction manager. He is proud to have been tutored by the founding leaders of the modern-day roof structure industry. In May of 1989, he founded Panelized Structures, Inc.
